title: How will the future world look on Islam in this century? - Quora

response.answer_text: Short answer: don’t know. Longer answer: I think it depends on a whole lot of decisions and outcomes, many of which we cannot fathom. Just look back on the histories of Christianity, Judaism and Islam. These 3, and many other religions, have had tumultuous histories throughout the centuries. You can look back on each event in different ways. And different historians do concentrate on different aspects when attempting to draw conclusions.

Now we are seeing the declining of the western christian civilitazion, especially in europe, as the most advanced civilization. I think Islam will be the natural replacement of the declining western christian civilitazion.
